definition: a lifesize cardboard cutout, usually of a celebrity
details:
noun
- a lifesize cardboard cutout, usually of a celebrity
= example: a lifesize cardboard cutout, usually of a celebrity
- someone who stands in a place where one might otherwise sit (as a spectator who uses standing room in a theater or a passenger on a crowded bus or train)
= example: someone who stands in a place where one might otherwise sit (as a spectator who uses standing room in a theater or a passenger on a crowded bus or train)
